quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.

quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.

quote: To the degree we're not living our dreams, our comfort zone has more control of us than we have over ourselves.

quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
name: Les Brown

quote: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.

quote: The human heart has hidden treasures, In secret kept, in silence sealed The thoughts, the hopes, the dreams, the pleasures, Whose charms were broken if revealed.

quote: I just write what I wanted to write. I write what amuses me. It's totally for myself. I never in my wildest dreams expected this popularity.

quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: My fear is that I go up to the girl of my dreams and say 'I'm sorry, but I've got to say hello to you,' and she slides the stool back and gets up and walks away, saying, 'Not for me, Bub. I don't want anything to do with you.'

quote: People are never more insecure than when they become obsessed with their fears at the expense of their dreams.

quote: Much can be inferred about a man from his mistress: in her one beholds his weaknesses and his dreams.

quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.

quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.

quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.

quote: To every people the land is given on condition. Perceived or not, there is a Covenant, beyond the constitution, beyond sovereign guarantee, beyond the nation's sweetest dreams of itself.
name: Leonard Cohen

quote: There's a joy and a pain about directing where the dreams you have are becoming concrete but the attention to detail, the need for time is such that it's overwhelming at times, and the stream of responsibility.

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: Dreams are real as long as they last. Can we say more of life?

quote: Take pleasure in your dreams relish your principles and drape your purest feelings on the heart of a precious lover.

quote: To be given the opportunity to help shape new artists' careers and mentor them to see their dreams come to fruition is a task I welcome with open arms.

quote: What is the conservative movement? It's pretty straightforward. We believe that the way prosperity is created is when people have the freedom and the opportunity to pursue their dreams.

quote: I think when you're in a relationship where you really care for the other person, when they achieve their dreams it's better than when you do yourself.

quote: Mitt Romney will stop the attacks on job creators, encourage entrepreneurs to chase their dreams, and bring good jobs and a better future to all Americans.

quote: So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions.

quote: You can't break my spirit, it's my dreams you take.

quote: I'm living out my dreams and I love what I do.

quote: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
name: Queen Latifah

quote: It's not like I don't have my own wants and dreams anymore - it's just that the kids come first. It's primal.

quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.

quote: God, that dumping ground of our dreams.

quote: I am consumed with the fear of failing. Reaching deep down and finding confidence has made all my dreams come true.

quote: What better model of a synthesis than a nocturnal dream? Dreams simplify, don't they?

quote: After having done this whole slew of press for 'Big Love,' now I'll have anxiety dreams for like a week and a half about all the stupid things I said. I can't even imagine being in front of the cameras all the time. I had a weird dream the other night that I was on 'Jersey Shore.'

name: Chloe Sevigny

quote: Barack Obama knows that to create an economy built to last, we need to focus on middle-class families. Families who aren't sure what Monday morning will bring, but who believe our nation's best days are still ahead.
name: Charles Schumer

quote: When we are motivated by goals that have deep meaning, by dreams that need completion, by pure love that needs expressing, then we truly live.
name: Greg Anderson

quote: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.
name: James A. Michener

quote: Everyone wants to look their best, everyone has dreams of wanting to look like something else. But we are who we are.
name: Samantha Morton

quote: I say to my colleagues never confine your best work, your hopes, your dreams, the aspiration of the American people to what will be signed by George W. Bush because that is too limiting a factor.
name: Nancy Pelosi

quote: Prime Minister Sharon, Prime Minister Abbas, I urge you today to end the designs of those who seek destruction, annihilation and occupation, and I urge you to have the will and the courage to begin to realize our dreams of peace, prosperity and coexistence.
name: King Abdullah II

quote: I'm not certain, but I have a little gypsy blood in me. name: Sam Raimi

quote: The atmosphere is much too near for dreams. It forces us to action. It is close to us. We are in it and of it. It rouses us both to study and to do. We must know its moods and also its motive forces.

quote: You know, one of my biggest dreams in life is to play a Disney princess.
name: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: When I look back over my life it's almost as if there was a plan laid out for me - from the little girl who was so passionate about animals who longed to go to Africa and whose family couldn't afford to put her through college. name: Jane Goodall

quote: Always wear cute pyjamas to bed, you'll never know who u will meet in your dreams.
name: Joel Madden

quote: A player dreams of being a superstar, but he doesn't want people flocking all over him asking for an autograph.
name: Dennis Rodman

quote: They should invent some way to tape-record your dreams. I've written songs in my dreams that were Beatles songs. Then I'd wake up and they'd be gone.

quote: The Columbia is lost, but the dreams that inspired its crew remain with us.
name: Dick Cheney

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams, as they are the children of your soul the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.

quote: Never set limits, go after your dreams, don't be afraid to push the boundaries. And laugh a lot - it's good for you!
name: Paula Radcliffe

quote: I want to help children in Serbia and around the world so they can realize their dreams.
name: Novak Djokovic

quote: Those born into poverty or on the margins of society require our extra support to realize their dreams.
name: Novak Djokovic

quote: I know it sounds corny, but when you follow your dreams, it happens. And if it's music, take it seriously.
name: Enrique Iglesias

quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.

quote: You have the dreams that you want, and then you have to do other jobs until you can get to that dream.

quote: I save my dreams and hopes for my kids. When I'm making a wish under a bridge or tunnel, it's always for them.

quote: If I thought that any of this was pre ordained, then it takes away any kind of incentive to struggle, or to put up with things, to reach for those impossible dreams, all those dramatic things.

quote: I think basically becoming famous has taken the place of going to Heaven in modern society, hasn't it? That's the place where your dreams will come true. It's an act of faith now they think that's going to sort things out.

quote: There's a line I have that our family was designed more for public than for private. But there are definitely some things that are only mine. I am someone who dreams at night, and you don't know what I'm dreaming.

quote: My father, his spirit is with me constantly, and I'm a believer in that world and the world of dreams and that stuff.

quote: I've never been bashful to say that I'm not really interested in Formula One. name: Danica Patrick

quote: I've been interested in dreams since I as a kid and I've wanted to do a film about them for a long time.

quote: But I have been interested in dreams, really since I was a kid. I have always been fascinated by the idea that your mind, when you are asleep, can create a world in a dream and you are perceiving it as though it really existed.

quote: After all those days in the cotton fields, the dreams came true on a gold record on a piece of wood. It's in my den where I can look at it every day. I wear it out lookin' at it.
name: Carl Perkins

quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky.
name: Arna Bontemps

quote: We are people with all the hopes, dreams, passions, and faults of everyone else. Eighty percent of us are born into families with no history of dwarfism.
name: Billy Barty

quote: You don't get old until you replace dreams with regrets.
name: Troy Dumais

quote: My new life goes beyond my dreams because my dream was Formula One and I achieved it. I'm a driver, I feel like a driver. I have won this race because I am alive.
name: Maria de Villota

quote: War is eternity jammed into frantic minutes that will fill a lifetime with dreams and nightmares.
name: John Cory

quote: In our dreams we are always young.
name: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: But I am delighted to be a Dodger, I grew up a Dodger fan and now my dreams have really come true.
name: Milton Bradley

quote: Don't be afraid of your dreams.
name: Jacques Parizeau

quote: Tell me about yourself - your struggles, your dreams, your telephone number.
name: Peter Arno

quote: When your dreams tire, they go underground and out of kindness that's where they stay.
name: Libby Houston

quote: I'll see you in my dreams.
name: Gus Kahn

quote: There are no dreams too large, no innovation unimaginable and no frontiers beyond our reach.
name: John S. Herrington

quote: I would go to bed every night and have dreams about having a time machine and somehow I'd have the ability to move through time and space freely, and save Anne Frank.
name: Jeff Mangum
